alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 04 at 4:12AM MST until January 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Mainly southern portions of Converse and Niobrara counties including Douglas and Lusk. * WHEN...Wednesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions possible due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling snow. Bitterly cold temperatures are also likely Wednesday night into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
